SEARCH

Interface IPasswordUpdate

All Known Implementing Classes:
Admin, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist, User
public interface IPasswordUpdate
The `IPasswordUpdate` interface defines a contract for objects that support password update functionality. Implementing classes are expected to provide their own logic for updating passwords. This interface ensures a standardized method signature for changing passwords.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    changePassword(String newPass)
    Updates the password for the implementing object.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      void changePassword(String newPass)
      Updates the password for the implementing object.
      Parameters:
      newPass - The new password to set. It must adhere to the specific password requirements of the implementing class.
